Doc: The provisions related to the holding and usage of posted collateral.

Source.Contents:
/#
   The provisions related to the holding and usage of posted collateral.
 #/
record FpML5.legal.HoldingAndUsingPostedCollateral {
  # The party to which the terms apply.
  partyReference : FpML5.legal.PartyReference

  # Specifies the conditions under which a party and its custodian(s) are entitled to hold collateral.
  eligibilityToHoldCollateral : FpML5.legal.EligibilityToHoldCollateral

  # Specifies whether the respective parties to the agreement have the right to rehypothecate the collateral held.
  useOfPostedCollateral : boolean

}

partyReference.Doc: The party to which the terms apply.
partyReference.Name: partyReference

eligibilityToHoldCollateral.Doc: Specifies the conditions under which a party and its custodian(s) are entitled to hold collateral.
eligibilityToHoldCollateral.Name: eligibilityToHoldCollateral

useOfPostedCollateral.Doc: Specifies whether the respective parties to the agreement have the right to rehypothecate the collateral held.
useOfPostedCollateral.Name: useOfPostedCollateral
